name: Space Needle
description: Space Needle, named after Seattle's iconic landmark, is a mostly sativa strain descended from Blue Dream and Vortex. Artists needing a creative kick will appreciate Space Needle's engaged and imaginative buzz, while patients may look to this sativa for relief of stress, anxiety, and depression.
descriptionPlain: Space Needle, named after Seattle's iconic landmark, is a mostly sativa strain descended from Blue Dream and Vortex. articles.title: New Strains Alert: Critical Kush, Space Needle, Goo, Golden Pineapple, and Rocky Mountain High
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week, Washington saw its first day of recreational cannabis sales and we're celebrating with some new strains! Critical Kush combines two fan favorites, Critical Mass and OG Kush, while Goo unites two other indica staples, Blueberry and Hindu Kush. Rocky Mountain High hails from the state of Colorado, and Space Needle is a local Washington strain arriving just in time for our recreational consumers. Lastly, we've added Golden Pineapple, a sativa-dominant hybrid with creative and uplifting effects.
Seattle locals who managed to snag a small bag of Sweet Lafayette, OG's Pearl, Copper Kush, and Opal OG Kush at Cannabis City's grand opening, remember to leave reviews for these new Washington strains!
Â Â Â 1. Critical Kush
Characteristics of Critical Kush:

Mostly indica
Cross between Critical Mass and OG Kush
Breeder: Barney's Farm
Earthy, spicy aroma
RelaxingÂ andÂ sedating
High in THC and CBD
May help with pain, stress, insomnia, and muscle spasms
Indoor flowering time of 50 to 60 days

Â  Â 2. Space Needle
Characteristics of Space Needle:

Mostly sativa
Cross between Blue Dream and Vortex
Delivers a creative and engaged buzz
May help with stress, anxiety, and depression

Â  Â 3. Goo
Characteristics of Goo:

80% indica
Cross between Blueberry and Hindu Kush
Fruity, earthy, blueberry aroma
Brings deep relaxation, slight cerebral energy, and sharpened appetite
May help with insomnia, pain, appetite loss, and muscle spasms
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

Â  Â 4. Golden Pineapple
Characteristics of Golden Pineapple:

Sativa-dominant hybrid strain
Cross between Golden Goat and Pineapple Kush
Fruity, tropical pineapple aroma
HasÂ creative and upliftingÂ effects

Â  Â 5. Rocky Mountain High
Characteristics of Rocky Mountain High:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Mikado and Colorado Green Bud
Breeder: Hazeman Seeds
Indoor flowering time of 63 days
